name: GetPreviousBlogPostVersions
description:
Retrieve all previous versions of a blog post in HubSpot.

Call this tool to access historical versions of a specific blog post using its 'objectId' in HubSpot CMS.

parameters.name: blog_post_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the blog post for retrieving its previous versions in HubSpot CMS.

value_schema.description: The ID of the blog post to retrieve previous versions of.

parameters.name: next_page_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor token to retrieve the next set of blog post versions, obtained from `paging.next.after`.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: before_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp to retrieve versions updated before this time.

parameters.name: maximum_results_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of blog post versions to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to retrieve previous versions of.

value_schema.description: The ID of the blog post to retrieve previous versions of.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
